title: You may have 200 years of experience
body:
But the playerbase has a lot more time than that running the program. When they spot a bug and tell you that it's there (thousands of times), a company with "200 years of experience" should know to listen.

Or is that statement a Hail Mary attempt to get us to shut up?

Edit: this goes for any issue really, from bugs to balance and even connection and performance issues (there is no reason why a higher demanding game runs more smoothly with less latency when the site is significantly further from where I live than you).
